subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In a game with more bizarre turns than an amusement park ride, the Rangers’ game against Carolina Sunday ended like so many others, with fans howling for Jaromir Jagr to salvage things.
snippet: In a game with more bizarre turns than an amusement park ride, the Rangers’ game against Carolina Sunday ended like so many others, with fans howling for Jaromir Jagr to salvage things.
